titles.title: To amend section 326 of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit continued participation by Historically Black Graduate Professional Schools in the grant program authorized by that section.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational Opportunities

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Economic and Educational. H. Rept. 104-504.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 238.
Placed on the Corrections Calendar, Calendar No. 16.

action.text: Called up from the Corrections Calendar for consideration.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.

vote.text: On passage Passed by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 3/7/1996--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to eliminate a specified grant renewal limitation, thus permitting continued participation by Historically Black Graduate or Professional Schools in a grant program for such institutions.
